title: Project Vaynes Voice
body: So did the voice actor for Sivir do the voice for project Vayne because I swear they sound exactly the same.

replies.body: That's what I thought too??? In the teaser the voice at the end sounded *exactly* like Sivir's and I remember thinking SIVIR was the one getting the legendary skin. The whole time watching the Project Vayne preview video I couldn't stop thinking about how much it didn't seem like Vayne's voice ._.
Yeah, I think the older VA probably wasn't available, but that teaser was still misleading since her voice has a lot of that raspiness that Sivir has.
Yea exactly. I think the skins nice but maybe consider changing the va :V
Yeah, I expected a Sivir skin because of the teaser, and hearing PROJECT: Vayne's voicelines there's no way that's not Sivir's VA.

I was quite saddened her old voice actress was unavailable. She was half the reason I fell for the champ.

That said the rest of the skin is 10/10. She is so edgy and just as twisted as her lore implies. I am happily in love.
Same, I'm glad Riot put effort into her new animations to make the skin worth it.

Hey there, I'm the VO Producer at Riot, and I wanted to give you all a heads up as to why we moved in the direction we did on Vayne's VO. When taking a look at the Legendary, we opened up a dialogue about who Vayne is in her base thematic and who she is in the Project universe. When you hear base Vayne, you hear the Gothic horror influences. It's consistent with our remorseless monster hunter, and the melodramatic purr really works to reinforce those thematic elements. When shifting to Project, we found her base VO, while iconic, took away from what we were trying to do with this particular skin. It's always our hope to give players the best possible experience we can. Shifting away from base Vayne's VO and leaning into the Project thematic created the most cohesive experience and one that we were excited to share with all of you.
I believe the main question was whether or not the voice actress is the same as the original, not as much about the lines being too far from her character.

Just to respond. I believe the issue with the voice is something reminiscent of the issues players had with Fiora. There was whiplash because there was a disconnect between what Riot believed were some of the iconic elements of the character and what players gravitated to. Vayne resonates with a lot of players, and personally I feel like she's a case where the whole is greater than the sum of its parts. 

I never thought about it until I heard this skin's VO but Vayne's voice is integral to her character. She should come across as twisted, confident and dark. In my opinion the voice over work for this legendary is the weakest part of this skin - I believe other players feel the same way. The VO of this legendary doesn't feel like a different interpretation of Vayne but the delivery of the VO lines leaves a lot to be desired. When I play Vayne want to I feel wicked, aloof and remorseless. 

I love the work done on the skin. I just believe the VO delivery didn't preserve an essential element of Vayne's character.

I think the issue is that PROJECT: Vayne’s voice sounds so disturbingly close to Sivir’s that it’s hard to imagine it being anyone else but Sivir. The skin itself is rad, the  lines are well-written/thematic, and the delivery of the VA is great. But, that’s Sivir in Vayne’s body, and the voice is too far removed from what makes Vayne, Vayne (which is precisely those pointed, melodramatic, gothic horror tones). For that reason, it’s difficult to feel immersed in the fantasy of the skin, in my humble opinion.

> [{quoted}](name=Diggity Jones,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=j78wRLx5,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-11-09T18:35:49.949+0000)
>
> Hey there, I'm the VO Producer at Riot, and I wanted to give you all a heads up as to why we moved in the direction we did on Vayne's VO. When taking a look at the Legendary, we opened up a dialogue about who Vayne is in her base thematic and who she is in the Project universe. When you hear base Vayne, you hear the Gothic horror influences. It's consistent with our remorseless monster hunter, and the melodramatic purr really works to reinforce those thematic elements. When shifting to Project, we found her base VO, while iconic, took away from what we were trying to do with this particular skin. It's always our hope to give players the best possible experience we can. Shifting away from base Vayne's VO and leaning into the Project thematic created the most cohesive experience and one that we were excited to share with all of you.

So what you’re trying to say is Vayne’s voice actress wasn’t available and you have to come up with something to explain what for a lot of fans ruined the skin completely ..?
I’m legit not buying this skin because it doesn’t feel remotely close to being Vayne and tbh it’s pretty disappointing to have so much of a character’s identity warped like that
Rip probably won't get it now. Vayne's original voice is too good.
Wow, here I was thinking they were finally gonna give attention to a champion who's not that popular in soloQ. But of course not. Guess I was stupid for hoping.
